subject: Re: [junit] Help with JUnit install on Fedora Core
msgSnippet: ... That s a little sparse to provide much help. http://www.catb.org/~esr/faqs/smart-questions.html Then we can try narrowing it down. James
messageBody:
On 4/27/05, Isaac Yao Addae <isaacaddae@...> wrote:
>
>
> I'm a beginner trying to install Globus Toolkit 3.2, and i'm having
> trouble loading JUnit. I'm using Red Hat Fedora Core. After I
> download the zip file, what do I do next? Please help.

That's a little sparse to provide much help.

http://www.catb.org/~esr/faqs/smart-questions.html

Then we can try narrowing it down.

James
